home.banner.description: Declaring your financial aspect of your last year shouldn't be complicated. Just relax and follow our wizard!
home.banner.title: Piece of mind.
home.welcome.description: DeclareCerto is a tool to help you easily declare your taxes in Brazil. With an easy and intuitive interface, you can follow the flow by picking the scenarios that better describe your financial situation last year.
page.title: DeclareCerto - the right way to declare your taxes.
home.welcome.nameUser: How would you like to be called?
new-layout.personal-form.form-family-nuc: Your core family is composed by your partner, your kids an his/her kids.
new-layout.personal-form.fieldset-family: Tell us how you want to be called during navigation.

Inform if you want to include someone as a spouse, dependents or feeding your family. Remember that the simulation of the scenarios is done considering the Nucleus and is the greatest opportunity to save with income tax!
What is your relationship with that person?
new-layout.personal-form.form-pessoal-da: Your data will be inputed in the right places to optimize your tax declaration.
new-layout.personal-form.field-set-perso: To continue, inform your personal data.
new-layout.personal-form.field-set.perso: You, your partner or any of your dependant has some kind of disability?
new-layout.personal-form.fieldset-occupa: We are almost there, inform your occupation!
new-layout.personal-form.fieldset-depend: Inform bellow the necessary information to continue.
new-layout.tax-revenues-components.field: How did you received money on 2020?
Inform bellow the times necessary so we can continue.
new-layout.tax-revenues-components.form-: Tell us how you received money last year.
Don't forget that your the money received by your dependant will influence your tax declaration.

income.navegation.option.received-rent.d: Enter below your data or that of your family, referring to 2020.

expences.navegation.option.health.descri: Here you will inform the main expenses you and your family had throughout 2020. Here you must inform mainly the expenses with education and health that most of them you can deduct from the IR and this will make you pay less tax. Other expenses, such as rent payment, are not deductible but it is important that they are informed.

asset.navegation.option.house.descriptio: Here you will inform your assets in 2020. Real estate, such as apartments, or furniture, such as a car. In addition, it is important to inform whether any goods have been acquired or sold or if any inheritance in goods has been received.

family.relationship-11-3: Companheira(o) com a(o) qual tenho filha(o)
family.relationship-11-4: Companheira(o) com a(o) qual vivo há mais de 5 anos
family.relationship-22-1: Filha(o) até 24 anos cursando nível superior.
family.relationship-22-2: Enteada(o) até 24 anos cursando nível superior.

family.relationship-23-2: Enteada(o) incapacitado física e/ou mentalmente para o trabalho, em qualquer idade.

family.relationship-24-2: Neta(o) até 21 anos a(o) qual detenho a guarda judicial.
family.relationship-24-3: Bisneta(o) até 21 anos a(o) qual detenho a guarda judicial.
family.relationship-25-1: Irmã(ão) até 24 anos, a(o) qual detive a guarda judicial até os 21 anos, que esteja cursando estabelecimento de nível superior.
family.relationship-25-2: Neta(o) até 24 anos, a(o) qual detive a guarda judicial até os 21 anos, que esteja cursando estabelecimento de nível superior.
family.relationship-25-3: Bisneta(o) até 24 anos, a(o) qual detive a guarda judicial até os 21 anos, que esteja cursando estabelecimento de nível superior.

family.relationship-25-5: Neta(o) até 24 anos, a(o) qual detive a guarda judicial até os 21 anos, que esteja cursando escola técnica de 2º grau.
family.relationship-25-6: Bisneta(o) até 24 anos, o qual detive a guarda judicial até os 21 anos, que esteja cursando escola técnica de 2º grau.
family.relationship-26-1: Irmã(ão) a(o) qual detenho a guarda judicial, incapacitado física e/ou mentalmente para o trabalho, em qualquer idade.
family.relationship-26-2: Neta(o)  a(o) qual detenho a guarda judicial, incapacitado física e/ou mentalmente para o trabalho, em qualquer idade.

family.relationship-31-1: Mãe ou pai que, em 2020, receberam rendimentos, tributáveis ou não, até R$ 22.847,76.
family.relationship-31-2: Avó ou avô que, em 2020, receberam rendimentos, tributáveis ou não, até R$ 22.847,76.
family.relationship-31-3: Bisavó ou bisavô que, em 2020, receberam rendimentos, tributáveis ou não, até R$ 22.847,76.
family.relationship-41-1: Menor pobre, até 21 anos, que o contribuinte crie e eduque e do qual detenha a guarda judicial.
family.relationship-51-1: Pessoa absolutamente incapaz, da qual o contribuinte seja tutor ou curador.
